panels.title: Number of Requests by Processing Time

targets.expr: topk(20, (1 - (sum(max_over_time(onecloud_back_django_http_requests_latency_seconds_by_view_method_bucket{app=~"^$application$",le="$threshold"}[$__range]) / ignoring(le) max_over_time(onecloud_back_django_http_requests_latency_seconds_by_view_method_count{app=~"^$application$"}[$__range])) by (method, view) / count(present_over_time(onecloud_back_django_http_requests_latency_seconds_by_view_method_count{app=~"^$application$"}[$__range])) by (method, view))) > 0.0099)
